alert.note: Alert for Central Cook; Lake; Northern Cook (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued June 10 at 3:51AM CDT until June 12 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...High wave action and dangerous currents expected at Lake Michigan beaches. Peak waves of 7 to 10 ft expected by Sunday evening. * WHERE...Lake IL, Northern Cook and Central Cook Counties. * WHEN...From late tonight through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Swimming conditions will be life threatening, especially for inexperienced swimmers. For information on swim advisories or bans at Chicago beaches: www. cpdbeaches. com. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS....Waves quickly building to 3 to 5 ft late this evening with lake enhanced cold frontal passage.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid dangerous swimming conditions and do not venture out onto piers, jetties, breakwalls, or other shoreline structures.
